com.ibm.xasdi_bridge.citizen

Class Citizen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.xasdi_bridge.citizen.Citizen

  • public abstract class Citizen
extends java.lang.Object
    Unit of simulation agent. It behaves according to messages.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected CitizenID cid 
      protected long time 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Citizen()
      Deprecated. 
      CitizenID cannot be bound to this agent. Use constructor with CitizenID. Constructor without CitizenID.

      Constructor with CitizenID.
